title: ParaFi Backs Jupiter with $35M, Bitcoin Liquidations Hit $2.5B
snippet: ParaFi Capital's $35M investment in Jupiter validates Solana DeFi superapp. Bitcoin liquidations hit $2.56B amid broader risk-off sentiment.

title: Bitcoin Crashes Below $80K in $1.7B Liquidation Cascade
snippet: Bitcoin plummets amid $1.7B liquidation cascade. UAE invests $500M in Trump crypto venture. Crypto thefts surge to $370M in January.

title: NT$5B Crypto Fraud, Address Poisoning Attacks Strike
snippet: Crypto scams surge with NT$5 billion fraud and address poisoning attacks highlighting persistent security risks in the ecosystem.

title: Kraken-Backed SPAC Closes $345M Nasdaq IPO
snippet: VCs poured $1.4B into crypto in January. Kraken-backed SPAC raises $345M on Nasdaq, signaling maturing institutional infrastructure.

title: Senate Advances CFTC Bill, Flying Tulip Hits $1B
snippet: Senate Ag Committee advances crypto bill establishing CFTC authority. Andre Cronje's Flying Tulip raises $75.5M at $1B valuation.

title: Fairshake Crosses $193M, Illicit Flows Hit Record
snippet: Crypto's political influence hits new high with Fairshake at $193M. Illicit flows surge to record $158B amid regulatory pressure.

title: Institutions Double Down as Bitcoin Supply Squeezes
snippet: Strategy controls 3.2% of Bitcoin supply. Mesh reaches $1B valuation in crypto payments. Tokenization reshapes capital markets.

title: Strategy Buys $264M BTC, Top Banks Enter Bitcoin
snippet: Strategy doubles down on Bitcoin amid slump. Over 60% of top US banks explore Bitcoin services. Ledger eyes $4B US IPO.

title: $40M Gov Wallet Theft, $16.8M SwapNet Exploit
snippet: ZachXBT links $40M government wallet theft to contractor exec's son. Matcha Meta loses $16.8M in exploit. Crypto ETPs see $1.7B outflows.

title: Bitcoin Technical Signals Weaken, Ledger Eyes $4B IPO
snippet: Bitcoin trades below 365-day moving average amid bearish Kumo twist. Ledger plans $4B US IPO. Superstate raises $82.5M for tokenization.

title: BitGo Raises $212.8M in US IPO, Saylor Buys $2B BTC
snippet: BitGo's IPO prices above range, raising $212.8M. Saylor's Strategy buys $2B BTC. Saga pauses chain after exploit. ETFs see $1B outflows.

snippet: Global regulatory landscape shows mixed signals with wins and warnings for crypto adoption across jurisdictions.

title: NYSE Tokenized Trading, Stablecoins Target $900B Remittances
snippet: NYSE builds blockchain platform for 24/7 tokenized trading. Bermuda aims for first on-chain economy. Stablecoins target $900B remittance market.
